name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Recurring Payment / Subscription Export for PayPal

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Exports all PayPal Recurring Payments / Subscriptions as CSV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
► Easily Export Your PayPal Subscriptions as CSV! ◄

This Chrome extension allows you to download all your recurring PayPal payments, providing a comprehensive view of both active and canceled subscriptions. It's perfect for financial analysis or managing monthly income.
Working with PayPal and PayPal Sandbox.

⭐ Example Use Cases:

● Financial analysis
● Monthly income calculation

⭐ How to Use:

1. Install the extension.
2. Visit paypal.com.
3. Log in to your account.
4. Navigate to your subscriptions overview at paypal.com/billing/overview.
5. Click the pink "Export All Recurring Payments as CSV" button.
6. Follow the prompt to download your CSV file.

⭐ CSV File Details:

The generated CSV file will include the following columns:
● id - ID
● status - Status
● plan_id - Plan ID
● create_time - Creation Time
● email_address - Email Address
● plan_name - Plan Name
● product_name - Product Name
● start_time - Start Time
● update_time - Update Time
● address - Address
● gross_amount - Gross Amount
● interval_unit - Interval Unit
● interval_count - Interval Count

❗Disclaimer:
Use at your own risk! This tool is neither supported nor endorsed by PayPal.
